issue.title: [Dev][Archery] Generate contribution statistics using archery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14472](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14472). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we use a bash script to do that:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/dev/release/post-03-website.sh#L47-L67

Since the rust repository split, this logic needs to be extended.
Additionally the scripts expects `gnu date` commands which is not available on macOS by default.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14472?focusedCommentId=17434349) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~thisisnic]` Could you please reference the prior work for merging the contribution statistics from the rust repositories?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14472?focusedCommentId=17434425) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Got most of the way there with https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12701 - just needs to combine the totals from running on both the `arrow` and `arrow-rs` repos.
